pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 22, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will welcome the Mexican secretaries-designate.

Closed to media

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Chief of Defence Staff, General Jonathan Vance, will meet with participants of the Canadian Forces College National Security Programme.

Closed to media
